verses.name: John 13:21
verses.text: When Jesus had thus said, he was troubled in spirit, and testified, and said, Verily, verily, I say unto you, that one of you shall betray me.

verses.name: John 13:22
verses.text: Then the disciples looked one on another, doubting of whom he spake.

verses.name: John 13:23
verses.text: Now there was leaning on Jesus’ bosom one of his disciples, whom Jesus loved.

verses.name: John 13:24
verses.text: Simon Peter therefore beckoned to him, that he should ask who it should be of whom he spake.

verses.name: John 13:25
verses.text: He then lying on Jesus’ breast saith unto him, Lord, who is it?
